title: My Christmas. December 25th, 1914. Lost and found
brief_description: A trio of animated segments weaves this program about recollections, stories and fantasies about Christmas. 1. “My Chistmas”. Interpretation of Teddy Roosevelt’s Christmas at age 11 in Rome. 2. “December 25th 1914”. Christmas Day in the trenches in 1914 when both sides declared a truce and shared food and songs. 3. “Lost and found”. In a pre-Christmas clean up, baby Gerald is thrown with the garbage. Based on the comic strip ‘Toorneville Trolley’.
